title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: DNA Replication Visualization Integrated Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the DNA replication process with over 80% accuracy through three representation methods (text/2D/3D graphics)
Learners can identify key features (color, shape, structure) in visual representations and connect them to replication mechanisms
Learners can analyze and compare differences between multiple representations, evaluating educational efficacy of each method with over 70% consistency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
